code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./scripts_css/audioslave.css';import Home from'./home';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Products(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/products').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProducts(data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));},[]);function renderProducts(products){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products-grid",children:products.map((product,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.Name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.Price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.Description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.ImgPath,alt:product.Name})]},i))});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Products"}),renderProducts(products)]});}export default Products;
